0.9.1.name: wordpress/overlay
0.9.1.description:
simple add overlay function from the magic jQuery Tools

no coding – only download and activate
* Themes
* Effect Settings (speed, position)
* great Apple Zoom- Out/In Effect
* set your own backgroundcolor
* image autoresize
* load any widgets in the overlay
